StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegeDegreeType]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode as integer, @FiscalYear as integer
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN
SELECT [SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, cad.[DEGREE_CODE] AS DegreeCode, RTRIM([DEGREE_DESC]) AS DegreeDescrip.on
FROM [MCRISS].[usmc].[CollegeAvailableDegree] cad INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[usmc].[AvailableDegreeType] adt ON cad.[DEGREE_CODE] = adt.[DEGREE_CODE]
where [SCHOOL_CODE] = @SchoolCode AND [FISCAL_YEAR] = @FiscalYear ORDER BY cad.[DEGREE_CODE]
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
